p: Using Flow Cytometry, we also examined the effects of bergenin on the suppression of cytokine-induced beta cell apoptosis. Two-day treatment of INS-1E cells with a cytokine cocktail caused approximately 50% of beta cell apoptosis when compared to the untreated controls ( Fig 4A and 4B); however, addition of bergenin significantly inhibited cytokine-induced beta cell apoptosis in a dose-dependent manner. Beta cell apoptosis was almost completely suppressed by 10 Î¼M bergenin ( Fig 4A and 4B).
